mapper.select: SELECT SB.SOURCE_SEQ AS sourceSeq ,CC.CODE_NM AS langNm ,CC.CODE AS langCd ,WU.USER_ID AS userId ,SB.title ,SB.content ,DATE_FORMAT(SB.edit_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS editDate ,DATE_FORMAT(SB.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate FROM SOURCE_BRD SB LEFT OUTER JOIN WHITE_USER WU ON WU.USER_SEQ = SB.USER_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CD CC ON SB.lang_cd = CC.CODE WHERE SB.SOURCE_SEQ = #{sourceSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOURCE_BRD(USER_SEQ, lang_cd, title, content, edit_date, reg_date) VALUES( #{userSeq}, #{langCd}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SOURCE_BRD SET title = #{title}, lang_cd = #{langCd}, content = #{content}, edit_date = NOW() WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND SOURCE_SEQ = #{sourceSeq}
